node.title: Think
node.content: Amira is gonna leave me, for sure. I need to do something. But what?

node.title: Do nothing
node.content: Undergo the break-up

node.title: Better idea
node.content: Doing nothing, great idea... I know I can find better. Let's search!

node.title: Run away
node.content: Run away

node.title: Dodge
node.content: Dodging. My speciality. Maybe the key is here.

node.title: Confrontation
node.content: I don't like confrontation, I've never done that. Is it time to begin?

node.title: Her reason
node.content: No doubt why she wants to leave me, we are so different. I feel like a toad in love with a princess.

node.title: Ninja
node.content: MaClassSound

node.title: Conversation
node.content: Why not telling her to continue the conversation in another place? It will give me more time to think.

node.title: Change the place
node.content: Talk elsewhere

node.title: Truth
node.content: In some way, I can't stand many things in her behaviour, her personnality... I would like she changes too.

node.title: Tell the truth
node.content: Tell the Truth

node.title: Past arguments
node.content: coupleIgnoring

node.title: Her anger
node.content: Sometimes, I feel she's angry because I'm not.

node.title: My silence
node.content: It's my only shield against her. And against people, in general.

node.title: My failures
node.content: jobJohn

node.title: Bored
node.content: When nothing happens in your life, your talk becomes uninteresting.

node.title: Dreams
node.content: My dreams... Right now, I have no idea of what they are. They have been buried. When I was a kid, maybe...

node.title: Childhood
node.content: MaClassSound

node.title: Deeper
node.content: Was life better when I was a kid? Seems to be.

node.title: Girls
node.content: MaClassSound

node.title: Friends
node.content: johnKidFriends

node.title: Ambitions
node.content: johnKidSpace

node.title: The nice time
node.content: I was a good seducer, I remember! Today, I'm shy like no one.

node.title: Trust in myself
node.content: I live in the shadow of Amira. Is it a normal situation? I'd feel better by having a less perfect girlfriend.

node.title: Accept the break-up
node.content: Accept the break-up

node.title: Her successes
node.content: jobAmira

node.title: Travels
node.content: The more she's traveling for his job, the less we can spend time together. I feel like she's running away from me.

node.title: Her fault
node.content: cheatingAmira

node.title: My fault
node.content: I'm to depressing for a girl like her. If I were her, of course I'd prefer to travel alone!

node.title: Happiness
node.content: smileCouple

node.title: Changing
node.content: Why am I no longer able to make her happy anymore? Something changed in me. Need to find it before she leaves.

node.title: Sadness
node.content: Why do I feel so depressed? I have a house, a job, and still a girlfriend. Every needed ingredients to hapiness.

node.title: Money
node.content: If only I could offer her something she coulnd't buy... Real men aren't supposed to be richer than their girlfriends? Don't want to be a drag for her.

node.title: Importance of money
node.content: We were happy together, at the begining. Two poor young lovers. Maybe money is not so important. This is not the solution...

node.title: New job
node.content: applicationJohn

node.title: Drag
node.content: I am already a drag! Always complaining about my life, nothing fun to say, needing her each time I feel bad...

node.title: Apologize
node.content: Say you are sorry

node.title: Bad Idea
node.content: Mmmh. Bad idea.
